Advance Unit Lupicia:
If you want to adjust to this place quickly, you should take on Fafurion's minions.
Go inside the Fafurion Temple and experience how menacing Fafurion's minions are. Then bring me evidence of your experience.
Defeat about 250 of the Temple Guard Captain, Temple Guardian Captain, Elite Guardian Warrior, Elite Guardian Archer, Temple Guard Member, Temple Knight Recruit, Temple Guard, Temple Guardian Warrior, Temple Wizard, Temple Guardian Wizard, and Hungry Water Dragon and bring me the Minion Marks as evidence?
10 of the Minion Marks should be enough.
